verses.verse: SHa'ul <WG3972>, a prisoner <WG1198> of Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547>, and <WG2532> Timothy <WG5095> our brother <WG80>, unto Philemon <WG5371> our <WG2257> dearly beloved <WG27>, and <WG2532> fellowlabourer <WG4904>,

And <WG2532> to our beloved <WG27> Apphia <WG682>, and <WG2532> Archippus <WG751> our <WG2257> fellowsoldier <WG4961>, and <WG2532> to the Congregation <WG1577> in <WG2596> thy <WG4675> house <WG3624>:
Grace <WG5485> to you <WG5213>, and <WG2532> peace <WG1515>, from <WG575> 'Elohim <WG2316> our <WG2257> Father <WG3962> and <WG2532> the YY <WG2962> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547>.
I thank <WG2168> <WG5719> my <WG3450> 'Elohim <WG2316>, making <WG4160> <WG5734> mention <WG3417> of thee <WG4675> always <WG3842> in <WG1909> my <WG3450> prayers <WG4335>,

Hearing <WG191> <WG5723> of thy <WG4675> love <WG26> and <WG2532> faith <WG4102>, which <WG3739> thou hast <WG2192> <WG5719> toward <WG4314> the YY <WG2962> Yeshuw`a <WG2424>, and <WG2532> toward <WG1519> all <WG3956> saints <WG40>;

That <WG3704> the communication <WG2842> of thy <WG4675> faith <WG4102> may become <WG1096> <WG5638> effectual <WG1756> by <WG1722> the acknowledging <WG1922> of every <WG3956> good thing <WG18> which <WG3588> is in <WG1722> you <WG5213> in <WG1519> Moshiach <WG5547> Yeshuw`a <WG2424>.

For <WG1063> we have <WG2192> <WG5719> great <WG4183> joy <WG5485> and <WG2532> consolation <WG3874> in <WG1909> thy <WG4675> love <WG26>, because <WG3754> the bowels <WG4698> of the saints <WG40> are refreshed <WG373> <WG5769> by <WG1223> thee <WG4675>, brother <WG80>.
Wherefore <WG1352>, though I might be <WG2192> <WG5723> much <WG4183> bold <WG3954> in <WG1722> Moshiach <WG5547> to enjoin <WG2004> <WG5721> thee <WG4671> that which is convenient <WG433> <WG5723>,

Yet for <WG1223> love's <WG26> sake I <WG3870> rather <WG3123> beseech <WG3870> <WG5719> thee, being <WG5607> <WG5752> such an one <WG5108> as <WG5613> SHa'ul <WG3972> the aged <WG4246>, and <WG1161> now <WG3570> also <WG2532> a prisoner <WG1198> of Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547>.
I beseech <WG3870> <WG5719> thee <WG4571> for <WG4012> my <WG1699> son <WG5043> Onesimus <WG3682>, whom <WG3739> I have begotten <WG1080> <WG5656> in <WG1722> my <WG3450> bonds <WG1199>:
Which <WG3588> in time past <WG4218> was <WG890> to thee <WG4671> unprofitable <WG890>, but <WG1161> now <WG3570> profitable <WG2173> to thee <WG4671> and <WG2532> to me <WG1698>:
Whom <WG3739> I have sent again <WG375> <WG5656>: thou <WG4771> therefore <WG1161> receive <WG4355> <WG5640> him <WG846>, that is <WG5123> <WG5748>, mine own <WG1699> bowels <WG4698>:

Whom <WG3739> I <WG1473> would <WG1014> <WG5711> have retained <WG2722> <WG5721> with <WG4314> me <WG1683>, that <WG2443> in thy <WG4675> stead <WG5228> he might have ministered <WG1247> <WG5725> unto me <WG3427> in <WG1722> the bonds <WG1199> of the gospel <WG2098>:

But <WG1161> without <WG5565> thy <WG4674> mind <WG1106> would <WG2309> <WG5656> I do <WG4160> <WG5658> nothing <WG3762>; that <WG3363> thy <WG4675> benefit <WG18> should <WG5600> not <WG3363> be <WG5600> <WG5753> as <WG5613> it were of <WG2596> necessity <WG318>, but <WG235> willingly <WG1595> <WG2596>.

For <WG1063> <WG1223> perhaps <WG5029> he <WG5563> therefore <WG5124> departed <WG5563> <WG5681> for <WG4314> a season <WG5610>, that <WG2443> thou shouldest receive <WG568> <WG5725> him <WG846> for ever <WG166>;

Not now <WG3765> as <WG5613> a servant <WG1401>, but <WG235> above <WG5228> a servant <WG1401>, a brother <WG80> beloved <WG27>, specially <WG3122> to me <WG1698>, but <WG1161> how much <WG4214> more <WG3123> unto thee <WG4671>, both <WG2532> in <WG1722> the flesh <WG4561>, and <WG2532> in <WG1722> the YY <WG2962>?
If <WG1487> thou count <WG2192> <WG5719> me <WG1691> therefore <WG3767> a partner <WG2844>, receive <WG4355> <WG5640> him <WG846> as <WG5613> myself <WG1691>.
If <WG1161> <WG1487> he hath wronged <WG91> <WG5656> thee <WG4571>, or <WG2228> oweth <WG3784> <WG5719> thee ought <WG5100>, put <WG1677> that <WG5124> on <WG1677> <WG5720> mine account <WG1698>;

I <WG1473> SHa'ul <WG3972> have written <WG1125> <WG5656> it with mine own <WG1699> hand <WG5495>, I <WG1473> will repay <WG661> <WG5692> it: albeit <WG3363> I do <WG3004> not <WG3363> say <WG3004> <WG5725> to thee <WG4671> how <WG3754> thou owest <WG4359> unto me <WG3427> even <WG2532> thine own self <WG4572> besides <WG4359> <WG5719>.

Yea <WG3483>, brother <WG80>, let <WG3685> me <WG1473> have joy <WG3685> <WG5636> of thee <WG4675> in <WG1722> the YY <WG2962>: refresh <WG373> <WG5657> my <WG3450> bowels <WG4698> in <WG1722> the YY <WG2962>.

Having confidence <WG3982> <WG5756> in thy <WG4675> `Ovedience <WG5218> I wrote <WG1125> <WG5656> unto thee <WG4671>, knowing <WG1492> <WG5761> that <WG3754> thou wilt <WG4160> also <WG2532> do <WG4160> <WG5692> more than <WG3739> <WG5228> I say <WG3004> <WG5719>.

But <WG1161> withal <WG260> prepare <WG2090> <WG5720> me <WG3427> also <WG2532> a lodging <WG3578>: for <WG1063> I trust <WG1679> <WG5719> that <WG3754> through <WG1223> your <WG5216> prayers <WG4335> I shall be given <WG5483> <WG5701> unto you <WG5213>.
There salute <WG782> <WG5736> thee <WG4571> Epaphras <WG1889>, my <WG3450> fellowprisoner <WG4869> in <WG1722> Moshiach <WG5547> Yeshuw`a <WG2424>;
Marcus <WG3138>, Aristarchus <WG708>, Demas <WG1214>, Lucas <WG3065>, my <WG3450> fellowlabourers <WG4904>.

The grace <WG5485> of our <WG2257> YY <WG2962> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547> be with <WG3326> your <WG5216> spirit <WG4151>. Amen <WG281>. Written <WG1125> <WG5648> from <WG575> Rome <WG4516> to <WG4314> Philemon <WG5371>, by <WG1223> Onesimus <WG3682> a servant <WG3610>.
